title: Apples, potatoes, and onions all taste the same when eaten with your nose plugged.
Strawberries are the only fruit which has its seeds on its outer skin.
Darker Green lettuce leaves are more nutritious than lighter green leaves.
When honey is swallowed, it enters the blood stream within a period of 20 minutes.
Eating one meal of fish a week reduces your chances of getting a heart attack by 50%.
The banana plant can grow as high as 20 feet tall. That’s as big as a two-story house!
When an egg floats in water, it is “off” and should not be eaten.
Smelling bananas and/or green apples (smelling, not eating) can help you lose weight!
40% of McDonald’s profits come from the sales of Happy Meals.
Every person has a unique tongue print.
Coca Cola was originally green.
Almost all lettuce is packed right in the field.

Banana’s are most likely the first fruit ever to be grown on a farm.

A typical banana travels 4,000 miles before being eaten.
